Minor optimisations
Minor optimisations

After a dry period with plenty of sunshine and little rainfall, we too have spent our time on the beach.
Unfortunately, the beautiful summer periods never last long enough, so after a few drops of feedback we have updated our weather app again to improve reliability. With this update, you can choose which map type is displayed on the radar function of the app: either the usual map or the satellite map.

So now you are totally ready for this lovely and wet summer!

After a dry period with plenty of sunshine and little rainfall, we too have spent our time on the beach.
Unfortunately, the beautiful summer periods never last long enough, so after a few drops of feedback we have updated our weather app again to improve reliability. With this update, you can choose which map type is displayed on the radar function of the app: either the usual map or the satellite map.

So now you are totally ready for this lovely and wet summer!

Just like the weather forecasts for the coming period, our app has also been improved. You can rest assured that when you’re taking five in the sun, your trusted weather app will warn you when you do need to take cover for approaching showers.

Just like the weather forecasts for the coming period, our app has also been improved. You can rest assured that when you’re taking five in the sun, your trusted weather app will warn you when you do need to take cover for approaching showers.

The holidays are over, and that means you have to go to school or work again. In short, it’s good to know when it’ll start to rain so you can adjust your schedule. The app still looks the same but in the background some things have changed so we can show you an even more accurate forecast.

Oh, and for those who are spending their holidays abroad right now: it’s good to install the update as well. Isn’t it wonderful to see all the rain at home you’re avoiding right now?

Oh, and for those who are spending their holidays abroad right now: it’s good to install the update as well. Isn’t it wonderful to see all the rain at home you’re avoiding right now?
Important bug fix, so we can help you better to stay dry!
Important bug fix, so we can help you better to stay dry!

Just like the leafs falling from the trees, our new update isn’t out of the blue either. Autumn is upon us, which means that our app is going to be your best friend again. Autumn is known as the rainfall season. Even though the weather forecast isn’t as bad as we’re used to this time of the year, we like to live by the motto: “better be safe than sorry”. Check the app before you leave home in order to avoid unpleasant surprises!

The app is optimised for iOS 10 and gets support for 3D Touch with some exciting new options to get quicker access to your favorite part in our app.

To help you as much as possible through this wet autumn season we are releasing an update again. The coming period it will rain more and more so make sure you update our app to get through this period as dry as possible!

We want to thank you for using Drops and giving feedback. Thanks to you we can improve the app!

In the newest update we have improved the widget. We want to improve the ease of use so you can keep using Drops with even more satisfaction.

Minor optimisations
Minor optimisations

Drops has a number of very cool, new updates! First of all, this new version works worldwide! A completely new map has been added. In addition, a new data stream has been introduced for displaying precipitation and sending notifications. Under the hood in effect, Drops has become a whole new app. And last but not least we have introduced a dark mode widget and solved some bugs. We hope you are as enthusiastic about Drops's revamp as we are!
